short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Channel Roronoa Zoro’s strength and determination with bold visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the world of One Piece with stunning visuals of Roronoa Zoro, capturing his fierce determination and iconic three-sword style.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek interface inspired by Zoro's legendary resolve, ensuring a seamless browsing experience.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on track with a stylish time and date display, perfectly matching the Zoro theme.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate to your favorite sites with a single click for effortless exploration.
🎮 Play Games: Discover fun and engaging games directly from your browser.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search efficiently with the integrated search bar.
🚀 More Extension: Add pirate-inspired features to enrich your browsing experience.
